title: How to apply for internship & requirements
body: I was looking around about internships for riot, and was curious about the requirements. I checked the jobs section on the website, but didn't see anything.

replies.body:
Hey One Finger Smash,

There's an FAQ for internships here: https://www.riotgames.com/en/internships-frequently-asked-questions

In it, there are certain questions like citizenship, age requirements, and other stuff. The rest of the internship information can be found here: https://www.riotgames.com/en/university-programs

Down at the bottom of the page, you'll see open internships when opportunities open up. I think it says to check on the page in September for Summer 2020 internships.
